name: Progpad
body:
Welcome To ProgPad

ProgPad Is A Programming Editor Meant For People Who Are Just Starting On Making Their Websites Or If They Just Want To Start On Learning To Program. ProgPad Can Be Used For Any Reason From Just Plain Text To Programming Stuff. ProgPad Is Being Developed And Fixed Almost Every Day To Fix Bugs And Add New Features. We Are Working On A Brand New Update To The ProgPad GUI To Help Make It Look And Feel A Lot Smoother Then What It Is At The Moment. Thanks For Downloading ProgPad, We Hope You Enjoy It!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
